panels.description: The number of clusters being reported.
panels.title: Number of clusters

panels.description: The number of nodes being reported.
panels.title: Number of nodes

panels.description: Percentage of clusters that have all nodes that are currently reporting healthy.

targets.expr: sum(min by(job, couchdb_cluster, cluster) (couchdb_couch_replicator_cluster_is_stable{job="integrations/apache-couchdb",job=~"$job",couchdb_cluster=~"$couchdb_cluster",cluster=~"$cluster",instance=~"$instance"})) / count(count by(job, couchdb_cluster, cluster) (couchdb_couch_replicator_cluster_is_stable{job="integrations/apache-couchdb",job=~"$job",couchdb_cluster=~"$couchdb_cluster",cluster=~"$cluster",instance=~"$instance"})) * 100

panels.title: Clusters healthy

panels.description: The total number of file descriptors open aggregated across all nodes.
panels.title: Open OS files

panels.description: The total number of open databases aggregated across all nodes.
panels.title: Open databases

panels.description: The total number of database writes aggregated across all nodes.
panels.title: Database writes

panels.description: The total number of database reads aggregated across all nodes.
panels.title: Database reads

panels.description: The total number of view reads aggregated across all nodes.
panels.title: View reads

panels.description: The total number of view requests that timed out aggregated across all nodes.
panels.title: View timeouts

panels.description: The total number of temporary view reads aggregated across all nodes.
panels.title: Temporary view reads

panels.description: The request rate split by HTTP Method aggregated across all nodes.

targets.expr: sum by(job, couchdb_cluster, cluster, method) (increase(couchdb_httpd_request_methods{job="integrations/apache-couchdb",job=~"$job",couchdb_cluster=~"$couchdb_cluster",cluster=~"$cluster",instance=~"$instance"}[$__interval:] offset $__interval))

panels.title: Request methods

panels.description: The average request latency aggregated across all nodes.

targets.expr: avg by(job, couchdb_cluster, cluster, quantile) (couchdb_request_time_seconds{job="integrations/apache-couchdb",job=~"$job",couchdb_cluster=~"$couchdb_cluster",cluster=~"$cluster",instance=~"$instance", quantile="0.5"})

avg by(job, couchdb_cluster, cluster, quantile) (couchdb_request_time_seconds{job="integrations/apache-couchdb",job=~"$job",couchdb_cluster=~"$couchdb_cluster",cluster=~"$cluster",instance=~"$instance", quantile="0.75"})

avg by(job, couchdb_cluster, cluster, quantile) (couchdb_request_time_seconds{job="integrations/apache-couchdb",job=~"$job",couchdb_cluster=~"$couchdb_cluster",cluster=~"$cluster",instance=~"$instance", quantile="0.95"})

avg by(job, couchdb_cluster, cluster, quantile) (couchdb_request_time_seconds{job="integrations/apache-couchdb",job=~"$job",couchdb_cluster=~"$couchdb_cluster",cluster=~"$cluster",instance=~"$instance", quantile="0.99"})

panels.title: Average request latency

panels.description: The total number of bulk requests aggregated across all nodes.

targets.expr:
sum by(job, couchdb_cluster, cluster) (rate(couchdb_httpd_bulk_requests_total{job="integrations/apache-couchdb",job=~"$job",couchdb_cluster=~"$couchdb_cluster",cluster=~"$cluster",instance=~"$instance"}[$__rate_interval]))
or
sum by(job, couchdb_cluster, cluster) (rate(couchdb_httpd_bulk_requests{job="integrations/apache-couchdb",job=~"$job",couchdb_cluster=~"$couchdb_cluster",cluster=~"$cluster",instance=~"$instance"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: Bulk requests

panels.description: The responses grouped by HTTP status type (2xx, 3xx, 4xx, and 5xx) aggregated across all nodes.

targets.expr: sum by(job, couchdb_cluster, cluster) (increase(couchdb_httpd_status_codes{job="integrations/apache-couchdb",job=~"$job",couchdb_cluster=~"$couchdb_cluster",cluster=~"$cluster",instance=~"$instance", code=~"2.*"}[$__interval:] offset $__interval))

sum by(job, couchdb_cluster, cluster) (increase(couchdb_httpd_status_codes{job="integrations/apache-couchdb",job=~"$job",couchdb_cluster=~"$couchdb_cluster",cluster=~"$cluster",instance=~"$instance", code=~"3.*"}[$__interval:] offset $__interval))

sum by(job, couchdb_cluster, cluster) (increase(couchdb_httpd_status_codes{job="integrations/apache-couchdb",job=~"$job",couchdb_cluster=~"$couchdb_cluster",cluster=~"$cluster",instance=~"$instance", code=~"4.*"}[$__interval:] offset $__interval))

sum by(job, couchdb_cluster, cluster) (increase(couchdb_httpd_status_codes{job="integrations/apache-couchdb",job=~"$job",couchdb_cluster=~"$couchdb_cluster",cluster=~"$cluster",instance=~"$instance", code=~"5.*"}[$__interval:] offset $__interval))

panels.title: Response status overview

panels.description: The total number of good response statuses aggregated across all nodes.

targets.expr: sum by(job, couchdb_cluster, cluster) (increase(couchdb_httpd_status_codes{job="integrations/apache-couchdb",job=~"$job",couchdb_cluster=~"$couchdb_cluster",cluster=~"$cluster",instance=~"$instance", code=~"[23].*"}[$__interval:] offset $__interval))

panels.title: Good response statuses
